Html:
I have looked for a sample code to read all the data of sheet 0 but i cant find it so i write here!

Code:
setincludepath(getincludepath() . PATHSEPARATOR . SOKVAGCLASSES .'Classes/');
include(SOKVAG_CLASSES. "/Classes/PHPExcel.php");
include SOKVAG_CLASSES .'Classes/PHPExcel/Reader/Excel2007.php';

// Skapar objekt
$objReader = new PHPExcelReaderExcel2007();
$objReader->setReadDataOnly(true);

// Laddar in filen
$objPHPExcel = $objReader->load(SOKVAG_SYS.$filnamn);

My sheet is like this:

A B C D ...
1 1 1 1
2 2 2 2

Is it possible to get the value in an array like...

$arraySheet'A' = array(1,1,1,1)
$arraySheet'B' = array(1,1,1,1)

I want an simple code to take all the data fr√•n the sheet...but how?
Will create a work item and implement a "toArray" and "fromArray" method.
This discussion has been copied to a work item. Click here to go to the work item and continue the discussion.
.. I don't understand :( Can you give an example code to load all the data of sheet into array?

Check the "read" example in the tests folder of the PHPExcel download.
If you want an array, use the toArray() method of the worksheet.
